Jaster.util



T[] BubbleSort(T)(T[] input, bool delegate(T, T) sorter);
Bubble Sorts "input" using "sorter" to determine the order, sorter returns true when it's first paramter, and it's second paramter need to be swapped in "input", otherwise false.

Example:
bool IntSort(int one, int two) { return one > two; } int[] Test = [ 70, 60, 50 ]; assert(BubbleSort!int(Test, &IntSort) == [ 50, 60, 70 ]);
